definition: the Forbidden City/the Imperial Palace in Beijing/same as 故宮|故宫[Gu4 gong1]
purple/violet
to endure
to prohibit/to forbid
city walls/city/town/CL:座[zuo4],道[dao4],個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: I'll introduce China to them, such as the Great Wall, the Forbidden City and Quanzhou.
sentences.chinese: 我會向他們介紹中國，如長城，紫禁城和泉州。

sentences.english: The site of the Forbidden City was situated on the Imperial City during the Mongol Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 紫禁城原本位於蒙元時期的都城。

sentences.english: In which palace did the Emperor Wanli pass away in the Forbidden City?
sentences.chinese: 明神宗死在了紫禁城的哪個殿？

sentences.english: LIFE】A Chinese tourist steals a glimpse of the Palace Museum inside Beijing’s Forbidden City.
sentences.chinese: 一位遊客偷偷張望北京紫禁城內的故宮博物館。

sentences.english: Cixi was sent to the Forbidden City in 1851 to be a concubine to Emperor Xianfeng.
sentences.chinese: 慈禧1851年被送進紫禁城，成爲咸豐皇帝的嬪妃。

sentences.english: From then on, Manchurian appeared on the horizontal board of Forbidden City.
sentences.chinese: 從此，紫禁城的匾額上出現了滿文。

sentences.english: We had a great view of the Forbidden City from a roof-top bar.
sentences.chinese: 還有幸從一個屋頂酒吧鳥瞰紫禁城的全貌。

sentences.english: One is how systematically to analyze background of culture inside Forbidden City.
sentences.chinese: 第一，如何系統地分析紫禁城內蘊的文化背景。

sentences.english: The Forbidden City lies in the center of Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 紫禁城坐落於北京的中心地段。

sentences.english: The palace of the first episode ZhaoJian special serial Forbidden City "."
sentences.chinese: 故宮系列專題第一集《肇建紫禁城》。

sentences.english: Yes. Even the Emperor's Forbidden City is a big "courtyard house".
sentences.chinese: 是啊，連皇帝住的紫禁城也是一個大四合院。

sentences.english: No less captive within the Forbidden City were the imperial concubines.
sentences.chinese: 紫禁城裏最可憐的奴隸是皇帝的嬪妃。

sentences.english: Have you ever been to the Forbidden City in Beijing in China?
sentences.chinese: 你去過中國北京的紫禁城嗎？

sentences.english: It is within walking distance to Dashilar pedestrian market and the Forbidden City.
sentences.chinese: 走路可以到大柵欄熱鬧的市集和紫禁城。

sentences.english: The Forbidden City is divided into two parts.
Chinese visitors are shown at the Forbidden City, in Beijing, on Jan. 14.
sentences.chinese: 這張是1月14日中國遊客在北京紫禁城。

definition: Hall of Supreme Harmony, the largest of the three halls that constitute the heart of the Outer Court of the Forbidden City 紫禁城[Zi3 jin4 cheng2]
imperial palace
former imperial palace
the Forbidden City/abbr. for 故宮博物院|故宫博物院[Gu4 gong1 Bo2 wu4 yuan4]
Yuanmingyuan, the Old Summer Palace, destroyed by the British and French army in 1860
Summer Palace in Beijing
Imperial City, inner part of Beijing, with the Forbidden City at its center
Temple of Heaven (in Beijing)
throne room
Puyi, personal name of the last Qing emperor (reigned as child 1909-1911), the subject of Bertolucci's biopic The Last Emperor
temporary imperial residence
Yongdingmen, front gate of the outer section of Beijing's old city wall, torn down in the 1950s and reconstructed in 2005
prince's mansion
place at the imperial court, where emperor handled government affairs, gave orders etc
Eight-Nation Alliance, involved in a military intervention in northern China in 1900
mountain resort/Qing imperial summer residence at Chengde, a world heritage site
Tanei township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
